Package org.webmacro.servlet

Interface Summary
CompositeTypeHandler Handler performing conversion of values of several parameters from HTTP request to a single Java type.
SimpleTypeHandler Handler performing conversion of a single parameter value from HTTP request to the value of a Java type.
TypeHandler Common empty interface for type handlers.
 

Class Summary
ActionServlet Highly configurable servlet that maps HTTP requests to servlet methods and provides automatic conversion of HTTP parameters to values of Java types.
 

Exception Summary
ActionException One of two types of exceptions that may be thrown by methods implementing actions.
ConversionException Thrown, if parameter conversion to a Java type fails.
